snippet.title: Truck Racing 2 - PlayStation 2 Gameplay
snippet.description:
[Despite the title, this is not a direct sequel to Truck Racer on the PSone, as the original was developed by Kung Fu Ltd.]

Developed by Brain in a Jar, this was one of their budget racing sims. Between 2004 and 2011, they worked with budget publishers like Oxygen Interactive, Blast! Entertainment, Midas Interactive and even Nordic Games (who later became what we know as Embracer Group).

PS2 version published by Midas Interactive
Wii version published by Nordic Games in Europe and Maximum Family Games in the US.
Also released on PlayStation 3 (as part of PS2 Classics in the European PlayStation Store) and Nintendo Wii.

#braininajar #midasinteractive #ps2 #playstation2 #retrogaming #retrogames #truckracing2 #nordicgames
